price: ‹ ߞߟߋߞߟߋߡߊߦߟߍߟߊ › ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߡߋ߬ߘߋ ߘߌ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߥߎߦߊ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߘߴߊߟߎ߫ ߝߍ߬؟
arabic: قَالُواْ فَمَا جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥٓ إِن كُنتُمۡ كَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū famā jazāuhu in kuntum kādhibīna
